Description

LimboLane is an independent game studio founded by Gabe Lane and Yugo Limbo, here to bring you experimental and evocative art.

History

Gabe and Yugo met in April of 2018, and bonded over _____. Passion for animation and games brought them together, and they set out work on Smile For Me almost immediately. Work on the game has been entirely remote, with the team-of-two seperated by three time zones.
